appSummary.name: RemoteTask
appSummary.description: RemoteTask is a task management app designed for remote teams, enabling real-time collaboration, file attachments, and progress tracking to streamline project management and enhance productivity.
appSummary.coreValue: Facilitates seamless collaboration and task management for remote teams, improving efficiency and communication.
appSummary.userJourney: 1) User registration/login, 2) Create or join a team, 3) Create and assign tasks, 4) Collaborate in real-time, 5) Track progress through dashboards, 6) Manage files and attachments, 7) Adjust settings and preferences

userPersonas: Project Manager - 35-50 - Intermediate technical level - Manages team tasks and progress
Remote Team Member - 25-40 - Basic technical level - Collaborates on tasks and updates progress
painPoints: Difficulty in tracking task progress remotely

keyTechnologies: AWS API Gateway for REST APIs
technicalOverview.dataRequirements: User profiles, task data, file attachments, collaboration logs, progress metrics

businessModel.marketSize: Estimated market opportunity of 10 million potential users in the remote work and project management industry
businessModel.competitiveAdvantage: Unique combination of real-time collaboration, file management, and progress tracking tailored for remote teams

developmentPhases: Phase 2: Task management and real-time collaboration (Week 3-5)
Phase 3: File management and progress tracking (Week 6-8)

recommendation.reasoning: Strong market demand for remote collaboration tools, clear technical feasibility with serverless architecture, and potential for high user engagement and retention.
suggestedImprovements: Develop mobile app for on-the-go access
Enhance security features for data protection
recommendation.nextSteps: Proceed with detailed architecture design and UML diagram generation
